name: @leosingleton/fim
author: Leo C. Singleton IV <leo@leosingleton.com>
description: Fast Image Manipulation Library for JavaScript

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:web
scripts.test:all: npm run test:node && npm run test:web:all
scripts.test:web:debug: npx webpack --mode=development --config=webpack.test.js && npx karma start --single-run=false --browsers Chrome
scripts.test:web:all: npx webpack --mode=development --config=webpack.test.js && npx karma start --browsers ChromeHeadless,Edge,Firefox
